item.description:
Our 5th consecutive monthly meetup will be held on Saturday, May 15th, 2010 at SunMoonStars Herbals, 38 Front Street, Rollinsford, NH 03835 - 603-617-3590.

This month we are going to discuss the "Law of Attraction" - the idea that the energy of your thoughts and your overall "vibrational rate" manifest the things in your life... and that taking concious control of these things can change your world.

The Law of Attraction has been popularized in "The Secret" but is actually a concept that was much written about in the 1800's. We'll have a quick overview of the works on the subject, but then will be sharing our own thoughts and experiences on the subject... and tips on how to make the Law of Attraction work for us.

There are several groups that focus on this concept alone - but as the New England Metaphysical Club hasn't talked about the subject since the group was re-started it will be good to do a session on this simple but powerful concept.

You don't have to be an expert on "The Secret" to participate this month - but if you have a story about a time when your thoughts or energies seemed to cause an event in your life, please come and share it!

As always, Dawnie will have some herbal tea brewing, and there will be some light snacks. The sessions usually go about two hours. Hope to see you there!
item.name: May 2010 Meetup
